data.title: Warner Music Group company profile
data.meta_description: In 2023 the revenue growth of Warner Music Group stagnated. The company engages in the sector 'Sound Recording & Music Publishing'.
data.text:
All companiesWarner Music Group

Warner Music Group

Warner Music Group was founded in 2003 and operates in New York, United States. The company engages in the sector 'Sound Recording & Music Publishing' (ISIC: 5920). The industry includes production of theatrical and non-theatrical motion pictures, whether on film, videotape or disc, for direct projection in theaters or for broadcasting on television; supporting activities such as film editing, cutting, dubbing, etc.; distribution of motion pictures and other film productions to other industries; motion picture or other film productions projection.
